thread.title: Here's The Washington Post sports cover: Oct. 16, 2015
thread.title_full: Here's The Washington Post sports cover: Oct. 16, 2015

title: Here's The Washington Post sports cover: Oct. 16, 2015
text:
By Dan Worthington October 16 at 1:27 AM Follow @danworthington 
The lineup was ALCS (for our Regional edition or until we got the Dodgers-Mets game), Caps, Terps, Redskins and Boz. 
We wanted to build around the Capitals game against the Chicago Blackhawks — the defending Stanley Cup champions. 
So the only real challenge this presented was working to gain some impact with Game 5 of the NLDS. We didn’t want a right rail with the games (small art possibilities), and I didn’t want to top strip it because it either would have pushed us into a six-column Caps display or a cover that looked too similar to yesterday’s setup. 
Here’s how we finished. 
Read all the cover stories here:
